title: Adults-Only Sorrentine Peninsula Escape with All-Inclusive Meals & Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Your gateway to Italy’s breathtaking Sorrentine Peninsula and the Amalfi Coast is here at the Grand Hotel La Pace Sorrento. This adults-only escape will transport you to a bygone era of sparkling marble lobbies, grand staircases and quintessential Italian flare. Fully indulge in seaside delicacies with all meals included, sip free-flow drinks all day, enjoy nightly entertainment and take in breathtaking mountain views from the outdoor pool.

Occupying a peaceful location just five minutes from the centre of Sorrento, guests are perfectly primed for day trips to nearby Positano and Naples, and a speedy 20-minute ferry ride away from the island of Capri.

title: Mornington Peninsula Heritage Luxury Steps from Sorrento Beach with Daily Breakfast & A$50 Dining Credit
description:
This beachside retro haven places the spoils of Victoria's Mornington Peninsula front and centre. Sorrento's four-story limestone hotel, circa 1875, is a sparkling jewel in the InterContinental Hotel Group's crown.

With a Gatsby-esque approach to design, the hotel's circular glass chandeliers and glorious bay windows welcome the sunlight. Indulgent marble-laden interiors feature swaths of forest-green velvet, making this heritage retreat the site of Sorrento once more.

Relax with locals at The Continental Sorrento's public bar and beer garden or indulge yourself at Audrey's whilst enjoying some of the region’s best seafood and wines in a breathtaking art-lined parlour.

Channel the glamour of Italy's Sorrento and relax by the heated pool, shaded by wide umbrellas. Complete your stay at the award-winning Aurora Spa & Bathhouse, floating your way through wellness heaven.
location_description: InterContinental Sorrento Mornington Peninsula, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 23 Constitution Hill Road, Sorrento, Victoria 3943, Australia

title: Sorrento Cliffside Sophistication with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktail & Two A La Carte Lunches
description:
Perched on the cliffs of the Gulf of Naples, Parco dei Principi Sorrento is a haven of elegance and romance, where the visionary design of Gio Ponti meets the timeless beauty of the Italian coast. With the majestic Mount Vesuvius rising dramatically in the distance, bask in the golden Mediterranean sun with exclusive access to a secluded private beach and a shimmering saltwater pool.

At Gio Ponti Restaurant, guests can savour authentic Neapolitan cuisine made with locally sourced ingredients. During the summer, the beach deck becomes Poggio Siracusa Restaurant, lauded for its seafood specialties. For those looking to explore, enjoy a scenic hike at the Path of the Gods, go on a boat tour to the surrounding islands, or unwind by the sea.
offer_address: Via Bernardino Rota 44, Sorrento, Naples 80067, Italy
